rows.label: qst703204_msg0001
rows.name:
From this close up, it looks
even more impressive.

rows.label: qst703204_msg0002
rows.name:
You bet! It's so...majestic!
It calms me right down... And
it reminds me of my father.

rows.label: qst703204_msg0003
rows.name:
Is that so? He must be
a great man, then.

rows.label: qst703204_msg0004
rows.name:
Heheh... He's a builder, my dad.
Sure, he's a bit grumpy and stubborn,
but he's someone you can rely on.

rows.label: qst703204_msg0005
rows.name: Me... I'd like to be like that, too.

rows.label: qst703204_msg0006
rows.name:
I wanna get strong and sturdy,
and stop disappointing
Kaede-chan all the time...

rows.label: qst703204_msg0008
rows.name: We're calling this tree the Waytree.

rows.label: qst703204_msg0009
rows.name:
That's a nice name. A
bit simple though, no?

rows.label: qst703204_msg0010
rows.name:
Wait! My dad's name is Zain!
I see what you did there!

rows.label: qst703204_msg0011
rows.name:
It's a name that will not only
remind you of him, but also of
the way you wish to follow. See?

rows.label: qst703204_msg0012
rows.name:
Man, I thought this at the water hole,
but Kaede-chan's really good at naming
stuff, huh? It's like a superpower!

rows.label: qst703204_msg0013
rows.name:
I have to, don't I...? Otherwise
casual travelers like you would
never remember what's where!

rows.label: qst703204_msg0014
rows.name: Heheh, that's so nice of you!

rows.label: qst703204_msg0015
rows.name:
Uhm... Sorry to put you out,
everyone, but would you mind
if we went a bit further?

rows.label: qst703204_msg0016
rows.name: Like... Maybe the top of that big root?

rows.label: qst703204_msg0017
rows.name:
It's a little far... Are you
sure you're up to it? You
really needn't push youself...

rows.label: qst703204_msg0018
rows.name:
Right now, I'm feeling capable!
And if I get turned around, I'll
just look out for this tree.

rows.label: qst703204_msg0019
rows.name:
...Well, if it's gonna help you grow,
I can't see a reason to say no.

rows.label: qst703204_msg0020
rows.name:
Heheh... Sorry and
thank you, Kaede-chan!

rows.label: qst703204_msg0021
rows.name: Right then, we're off!
